mapper.insert: insert into tb_cust (cust_pw, cust_name, cust_nick, cust_email, cust_phone, cust_birthdate, cust_gender, cust_addr, joined_at, cust_role) values (SHA2(#{cust_pw},224),#{cust_name}, #{cust_nick},CONCAT(#{cust_email}, '@', #{email_domain}), #{cust_phone}, #{cust_birthdate}, #{cust_gender}, #{cust_addr}, NOW(), 'U');
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select * from tb_cust where cust_phone=#{cust_phone} and cust_pw=SHA2(#{cust_pw},224)
mapper.insert: insert into tb_seller (cust_id, company_name, company_addr, company_bno, business_type, certified_yn, created_at) values(#{cust_id}, #{company_name}, #{company_addr}, #{company_bno}, #{business_type}, 'N', now())
mapper.update: update tb_cust set cust_role='S' where cust_id=#{cust_id}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_favorite where cust_id=#{cust_id} and prod_idx=#{prod_idx};
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_favorite where cust_id=#{cust_id} and prod_idx=#{prod_idx}

SELECT p.prod_name AS prod_name, p.prod_price AS prod_price, di.img_name AS img_name, di.img_real_name AS img_real_name, di.img_ext AS img_ext FROM tb_favorite f JOIN tb_prod p ON f.prod_idx = p.prod_idx LEFT JOIN tb_diary_image di ON p.prod_idx = di.diary_idx WHERE f.cust_id = #{cust_id};
